attributes.action: cut the price on petrol duty by 20%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to bring our petrol prices down and more in line with our european counterparts. Plus stop ordinary familys suffering finacial hardship.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition already there - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/petrol-levy/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
